ygData.subject: RE: re: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spo iler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He is part of a multi-part quest involving collecting two eyes to put into a skull.  Dunno if he ll give up his item to dark elves who talk to him -
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, john doe wrote:
>
> I had a run in with Nix last night. I think a dark elf needs to talk to
> him...
>
> I popped out of the water to see him standing right in front of me. Having
> never seen him before I was thinking, "huh, a pc Dark Elf down here all
> alone..." Then he screams something like "You must give me the
> [eye]..etc". It's interesting to note that the word eye is in
> brackets...like he has a quest for me. Too bad he immediately started

He is part of a multi-part quest involving collecting two
"eyes" to put into a skull. Dunno if he'll give up his item
to dark elves who talk to him - everyone I've seen do the
quest gts it by killing him.

The final quest reward must be held in your hand so probably
isn't worthwhile for bards.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
